ARABIC: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Our Signs are recited to him, he says, 'Just myths and legends of the previous peoples!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When Our revelations are recited before him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who, when Our verses are recited to him, says: “Mere tales of olden times!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who, when listening to Our revelations, say, "These are only ancient legends".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When you recite Our verses to him, he says, “Stories of earlier men!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When Our Ayat are recited to him, he says: "Tales of the ancients!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When Our communications are recited to him, he says: Stories of those of yore.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When our signs are recited to him, he says, 'Fairy-tales of the ancients!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who, when thou readest unto him Our revelations, saith: (Mere) fables of the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When Our revelations are conveyed to him, he says, "Fables of the ancients!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when Our revelations are rehearsed Unto him, she saith:'fables of the ancients!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘Myths of the ancients!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When Our Verses (of the Quran) are recited to him he says: "Tales of the ancients!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When Our verses are recited to him, he says: 'Fictitious tales of the ancients'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Legends of the ancients.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:13] When Our signs, [of] the Qur’ān, are recited to him, he says, ‘[Mere] fables (asātīr) of the ancients!’, [mere] tales that were written down (sutirat) in ancient times (asātīr is the plural of ustūra or istāra).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who, when thou readest unto him) unto al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah (Our revelations) the Qur'an explaining the commands and prohibitions, (saith: (Mere) fables of the men of old) this is nothing but the lies and idle talk of the people of old. 739
